title: We Don’t Talk Like We Used To
description:
Boog Sciambi and Buster discuss the struggling Cubs, Oneil Cruz showing off his tools, Boog’s indifference to immaculate innings and hitting for the cycle, Max Scherzer giving the quote of the year, how the Mets could up the price for Aaron Judge this offseason, Jack Flaherty’s weak outing, and the Brewers’ vulnerability. Then, Todd Radom stops by to talk about his trip to Toronto, share this week’s Phantom Franchise and administer the quiz.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Buster and Boog Sciambi discuss Oneil Cruz's tools, Max Scherzer's quote of the year and the Mets upping the price for Aaron Judge. Plus, Todd Radom with the Phantom Franchise
